| Claim financial measures Gi

« Various measures used by insurers to describe and act on a claim

¢ The base application measures:
Total Reserves = all approved reserves
Open Reserves = Total Reserves - Past Payments
Remaining Reserves = Open Reserves - Future Payments
Available Reserves = Remaining Reserves - Pending Approval Payments
Total Incurred Gross = Open Reserves + Past Payments
Net Total Incurred = Total Incurred Gross- Recoveries

Question

,~ — How does ClaimCenter exit the validation rule set? Why?

¢
4
¢

SS oe ooo ee oe ooo ooOD

Answer a

,~ — How does ClaimCenter exit the validation rule set? Why?
¢
4
¢

The correct answers are:

The actions.exit() method is not used; rather, the rule set exits when all transaction
validation rules have been executed, in the order in which they appear in Studio.

This is because success (or failure) of one validation condition does not necessarily
mean that another will not fail (or succeed). By running all the rules, ClaimCenter
provides a full list of any conditions that must be remedied before continuing.
